question: Which state launches SAUBHAGYA to provide free electricity recently?
explanation: Jammu and Kashmir government launched SAUBHAGYA (Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojna) with an aim to provide free electricity connections to poor people in the state. SAUBHAGYA, an initiative taken by the prime minister, seeks to provide electricity to 4 crore families across India by December 2018. Jammu & Kashmir's Deputy Chief Minister Nirmal Singh launched the scheme.
